Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: integrate ElevenLabs Music API and add audio production features

- Replace Suno API with ElevenLabs Eleven Music for high-quality 44.1kHz stereo output
- Add elevenLabsMusicService.ts with music generation, instrumental, and vocal track support
- Add VU meters with real-time audio level visualization
- Add parametric EQ with adjustable frequency bands
- Update MusicCreation to support dynamic MP3/WAV download formats
- Fix TypeScript error in SocialMarketing video operation error handling
- Add environment types for ElevenLabs API key

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add professional audio metering and processing components

- Add SpectrumAnalyzer with 64-band FFT, bars/line/filled modes, peak hold
- Add LufsMeter with LUFS measurement and platform presets \(Spotify/YouTube/Apple/Broadcast\)
- Add StereoFieldVisualizer with goniometer, correlation meter, and balance indicator
- Add MultibandCompressor with 4-band dynamics and presets \(Gentle/Punch/Broadcast/Vocal\)
- Integrate Pro Metering panel into AudioProduction mixer
- Add audio metering types to types.ts

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
